mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_CODE ,PRODUCT_NAME ,ORIGIN_COST ,RELEASE_DATE ,DISCOUNT_RATE ,SALES_QUANTITY ,STOCK_QUANTITY ,CATEGORY_CODE ,PRODUCTION_STATUS FROM PRODUCT_INFO ORDER BY PRODUCT_CODE

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE ,PRODUCT_NAME ,ORIGIN_COST ,RELEASE_DATE ,DISCOUNT_RATE ,SALES_QUANTITY ,STOCK_QUANTITY ,CATEGORY_CODE ,PRODUCTION_STATUS FROM PRODUCT_INFO
WHERE PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
WHERE DISCOUNT_RATE = '0'
WHERE DISCOUNT_RATE >= '1'
WHERE RELEASE_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND NOW()
WHERE PRODUCTION_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_INFO ( PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_CODE, ORIGIN_COST, RELEASE_DATE, STOCK_QUANTITY, DISCOUNT_RATE ) VALUES ( #{ productName }, #{ categoryCode }, #{ originCost }, #{ releaseDate }, #{ stockQuantity }, #{ discountRate })
mapper.update:
UPDATE PRODUCT_INFO
SALES_QUANTITY = #{ salesQuantity },
PRODUCTION_STATUS = #{ productionStatus },
WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{ productCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{ productCode }
